item.title: 在阿拉巴马州最高法院关于冷冻胚胎是 "儿童 "的判决引发的政治风波中，乔-拜登总统预计将利用周四的国情咨文演讲将自己和民主党人塑造成生殖自由的捍卫者。
item.description:
Amid the political fallout over the Alabama Supreme Court decision that frozen embryos are "children," Pres. Joe Biden is expected to use his State of the Union address Thursday to cast himself, and Democrats, as defenders of reproductive freedom.https://t.co/ebCZyHy0zG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 凯特.考克斯（Kate Cox）今年早些时候被德克萨斯州最高法院拒绝紧急堕胎，她将作为嘉宾出席拜登总统的 #SOTU.She 和达姆拉.卡桑（Damla Karsan）博士在演讲前加入 @RachelVScott 的行列，她们希望这次演讲能够突出生殖权利。
item.description:
Kate Cox — who was denied an emergency abortion by the Texas Supreme Court earlier this year — will be a guest at Pres. Biden’s #SOTU.

She and Dr. Damla Karsan join @RachelVScott ahead of the address, which they hope will spotlight reproductive rights. https://t.co/c4vr8i45Tf pic.twitter.com/VI5yOzBgUE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 根据立法者提交给共和党州长罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）的一项法案，佛罗里达州将禁止无家可归者在公共场所扎营或露宿。
item.description:
Florida will ban homeless people from setting up camp or sleeping on public property under a bill lawmakers sent to Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis. https://t.co/wB7CurCOMY pic.twitter.com/u5twWcbqDu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 失控的马匹一辆汽车上的围观者拍摄到的画面显示，周六，一对放纵的警马在克利夫兰高速公路上飞奔。官员说，这两匹马已经安全返回。
item.description:
RUNAWAY HORSES: Footage captured by onlookers in a car shows a pair of loose police horses galloping down a Cleveland highway Saturday. The two horses have since been returned safely, officials say. https://t.co/cWJf37WRyC pic.twitter.com/VrmB7xcway

— ABC News (@ABC) March 8, 2024

item.title: 特别顾问杰克-史密斯（Jack Smith）针对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）所称的 "轻率 "行为做出了一系列回应，要求驳回他的机密文件案。
item.description:
Special counsel Jack Smith has issued a wave of responses to what he described as "frivolous" efforts by Donald Trump to have his classified documents case dismissed.https://t.co/2KehxDDL0r

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 科尔-布劳尔（Cole Brauer）周四抵达西班牙科鲁尼亚，成为第一位独自不间断环游世界的美国女性。
item.description:
Cole Brauer became the first American woman to race nonstop around the world by herself when she arrived Thursday in A Coruña, Spain. https://t.co/N7yeZdXrbx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据立法者提交给共和党州长罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）的一项法案，佛罗里达州将禁止无家可归者在公共场所扎营或露宿。
item.description:
Florida will ban homeless people from setting up camp or sleeping on public property under a bill lawmakers sent to Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis. https://t.co/PRjv9v4q0y pic.twitter.com/EdySEkewuW

item.title: 周四晚，乔-拜登总统将在他的第三次国情咨文演讲中面对今年最重要的全国听众之一。
item.description:
President Joe Biden will face one of his biggest national audiences of the year Thursday night at his third State of the Union address.

It's an opportunity for Biden to make his case for a second term to millions of Americans.https://t.co/LD2BvhcbgP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 美国联合航空公司一架航班周四从旧金山起飞时丢失了一个轮胎，导致这架飞往日本的飞机改道飞往洛杉矶。
item.description:
A United Airlines flight lost one of its tires during takeoff from San Francisco on Thursday, causing the Japan-bound plane to be diverted to Los Angeles, where the flight landed safely without incident, the airline said. https://t.co/Gi83tyIrxm pic.twitter.com/wgi4YCBEq2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 演员、制片人兼喜剧演员约翰-莱吉扎莫多年来一直在为拉美裔在好莱坞代表性不足的问题敲响警钟。现在，研究和咨询公司麦肯锡公司的一份新报告提供了数据支持。
item.description:
Actor, producer and comedian John Leguizamo has been sounding the alarm on underrepresentation of Latinos in Hollywood for years.

Now, a new report from research and consulting firm McKinsey & Company has the data to back it up. https://t.co/Xj6Y23Wy5u

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 两名犹太学生对麻省理工学院提起联邦诉讼，指控该校纵容校园内的反犹太主义行为，导致他们受到恐吓、骚扰和攻击。
item.description:
Two Jewish students filed a federal lawsuit against the Massachusetts Institute of Technology accusing the university of allowing antisemitism on campus that has resulted in them being intimidated, harassed and assaulted. https://t.co/wAUl0nDyjY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 史蒂夫-劳伦斯（Steve Lawrence）是一位艺人，他与妻子艾迪-戈尔曼（Eydie Gorme）共同组成了标志性的 "史蒂夫与艾迪 "二人演唱组合（Steve & Eydie），并为该组合贡献了数十年。
item.description:
Steve Lawrence, the entertainer who spent decades as one half of the iconic singing duo Steve & Eydie with wife Eydie Gorme, has died at 88.https://t.co/Ex60LWK0gR pic.twitter.com/GVk3xP1yPG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 阿尔迪计划在五年扩张计划中，在全美新增 800 家折扣杂货店。
item.description:
Aldi plans to add 800 of its discount grocery stores across the U.S. in a five-year expansion plan. https://t.co/pbRGiX9rLf

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据警方称，在加勒比海游艇上失踪的美国夫妇凯西-布兰德尔（Kathy Brandel）和拉尔夫-亨德利（Ralph Hendry）被控谋杀。
item.description:
The suspects in the deaths of Kathy Brandel and Ralph Hendry, an American couple who went missing from their yacht in the Caribbean, have been charged with murder, according to police. https://t.co/gvvq7s3dvJ pic.twitter.com/bxDd1ufYnP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 负责监督前总统特朗普即将进行的封口费审判的法官已同意限制披露陪审员的姓名，原因是担心会有骚扰。
item.description:
The judge overseeing former Pres. Trump’s upcoming hush money trial has agreed to limit the disclosure of the names of jurors due to concerns about harassment. https://t.co/h0m76K0IcI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 法官驳回了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）关于推迟对 E. Jean Carroll 诽谤案进行处罚的请求，特朗普只剩下几天时间来支付 8,300 万美元的判决赔偿金。
item.description:
A judge has denied Donald Trump's request to delay the penalties in E. Jean Carroll's defamation case, leaving Trump just days to cover the $83 million judgment.https://t.co/3nhb346ZvE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统在发表国情咨文之前，与曾扮演过虚构的美国总统的演员们进行了虚拟会面，并向他们征求意见。
item.description:
Pres. Biden met virtually with actors who've played fictional American presidents and asked them for their advice ahead of his State of the Union address. https://t.co/VRtvSGGPI1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: "早安美国》节目联合主播迈克尔-斯特拉汉（Michael Strahan）的女儿伊莎贝拉-斯特拉汉（Isabella Strahan）在与癌症抗争的过程中，最近接受了第二次脑部手术，并分享了她的最新健康状况。
item.description:
"Good Morning America" co-anchor Michael Strahan's daughter Isabella Strahan is sharing a health update after recently undergoing a second brain surgery amid her cancer battle. https://t.co/pBMp07CuFP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据知情人士向 ABC 新闻透露，92 岁的保守派媒体大亨鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）已是第六次订婚。
item.description:
JUST IN: Rupert Murdoch, the 92-year-old conservative media mogul, is engaged for the sixth time, sources familiar with the matter tell ABC News. https://t.co/vybawk1Kc5 pic.twitter.com/rVLbtwp0RM

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 根据新的研究，美国一些沿海城市正在 "消失 "在地面上，这可能会在不久的将来进一步加剧海平面上升的复杂性。
item.description:
Several coastal cities around the United States are "disappearing" into the ground, according to new research, which could further exacerbate complications of sea level rise in the near future. https://t.co/yYrEcxZHql pic.twitter.com/F95sKNysiC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据知情人士向 ABC 新闻透露，92 岁的保守派媒体大亨鲁珀特-默多克（Rupert Murdoch）已是第六次订婚。

item.title: 拜登总统将在国情咨文中就一系列问题发表讲话，但对许多美国人来说，最紧迫的问题是如何处理南部边境问题。
item.description:
Pres. Biden is set to address a wide range of issues at his State of the Union address — but among the most pressing for many Americans is what to do about the southern border. https://t.co/IL0BHe3aov

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 据哈马斯管理的加沙卫生部称，在持续不断的以色列-哈马斯战争中，至少有 20 人死于营养不良和脱水。
item.description:
At least 20 people have died from malnutrition and dehydration amid the ongoing Israel-Hamas war, according to the Hamas-run Gaza Ministry of Health. https://t.co/GunKu1WwPV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 法官裁定，被控在佐治亚大学校园内谋杀一名护理专业学生的男子的兄弟将继续被关押候审。
item.description:
The brother of the man accused of murdering a nursing student on the campus of the University of Georgia is to remain locked up pending trial, a judge ruled. https://t.co/IXlQ94wlPn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 官员们说，拜登总统的国情咨文演讲是他说服美国人他正在努力降低生活成本的一个机会。
item.description:
Pres. Biden's State of the Union address is a chance for him to persuade Americans he's working to lower their cost of living, officials say. https://t.co/7wp9SpQAkm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 奥本海默实验室和原子弹试验场附近的新墨西哥州西班牙裔和原住民至今仍在努力应对辐射。
item.description:
Hispanic and Native American New Mexicans near Oppenheimer’s lab and atomic testing grounds are still grappling today with the fallout. https://t.co/1AzW2J0u7Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：德克萨斯州乌瓦尔德市议会委托一份报告，调查应对罗布小学大规模枪击事件的警员的行为，报告认为警方的失误包括缺乏沟通和缺乏明确的领导。
item.description:
LATEST: A report commissioned by the Uvalde, Texas, city council to investigate the actions of officers who responded to the Robb Elementary School mass shooting determined a lack of communication and a lack of clear leadership were among police failures. https://t.co/vcZISzx8w6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 警方称，一名 19 岁的斯里兰卡人已被逮捕，并被指控在加拿大渥太华涉嫌谋杀六人，其中包括四名儿童。
item.description:
A 19-year-old Sri Lankan national has been arrested and charged with the alleged murders of six people, including four children, in Ottawa, Canada, police said. https://t.co/FhXAMOGM1H

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024

item.title: 西南航空以崭新的面貌登机，重新设计的客舱拥有更大的行李箱空间、设备支架、电源插座和高级飞机座椅。但是，尽管这些改进是亟需的，旅客们还是很快对升级提出了批评。
item.description:
Southwest is onboarding a brand new look with re-designed cabins featuring larger bin space, device holders, power outlets, and premium aircraft seats. But despite the much-needed enhancements, travelers were quick to criticize the upgrades. https://t.co/5W4aBMjsFU pic.twitter.com/ZhVg24WZ6i

— ABC News (@ABC) March 7, 2024
